overview: GitHub Issues are now significantly faster with 35% of issue views occurring in under 200ms, up from 2% at the start of the year.

detailed_explanation.title: Overview
bullets: GitHub Issues are now significantly faster with 35% of issue views occurring in under 200ms, up from 2% at the start of the year.
This is the first in a series of performance improvements we’re shipping to make GitHub Issues, and GitHub more broadly, feel instant.

detailed_explanation.title: Availability
bullets: These performance improvements are live today on github.com. In order to benefit from them, you must be signed in . No configuration or opt-in is required.
You can experience these improvements through:
We’re working on bringing these improvements to additional pathways.

detailed_explanation.title: Let us know what you think
bullets: Join the GitHub Community to share your feedback.
